import-definition.name: MA DOE SPED
import-definition.comment:
Import File Format: CSV, Wrapped in Double Quotes
No column headers in file
Field Count must = the number of columns in the import file
If your import file does not contain the 'Last IEP Evaluation Date', simply change the 'Field Count' to 7 and remove the '8' from the 'Last IEP eval date position'
